RelatedSentence: An elderly couple was killed in an apparent mishap involving their pickup truck on Sunday night in the Mid-City area , police said .
About 9 p.m. on the 4200 block of West Overlook Drive , a man was repositioning a truck in his driveway when he backed into and struck his husband , police said .

With the truck still in gear , the man then got out to check on her wife , only to have the truck roll back and over her , killing her , police said .
